review: This is a well made table top stand. The weight of the stand holds the mic and wire in place with ease. I would get this stand again.
I got this for my wireless mics but they don't fit in this holder. I got the wrong size holder. Other then that it is a good holder
If you have several different people on the same mic you should buy a stock of these. They are well made and do work. I would buy them again.
For the price you can not beat these. They work great and after a year with them they are still working like the day I got them. This is a great buy.
This stand really stands up to the wear and tear of use. It is well made and I would buy it again if needed.
